trans-unit.source: Indicates how a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> will behave when one or more of its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children slips.

Indicates that a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> will not slip with the child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>, but will expand to fit all slipping <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> children.

**NOTE**: This is only effective when the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> is not explicitly specified.

Indicates that a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline"></xref> will slip along with its first child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> that can slip whenever that child is delayed or accelerated..
